org.cougaar.core.component
Class BindingUtility

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.core.component.BindingUtility

public final class BindingUtility
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of utilities to be used for binding components. The real work happens in BindingUtilityWorker.

Method Summary
